item.title: AWS S3 Storage Class
AWS Typical 3 Tier Solution Architecture
item.description: The above picture shows the classic 3 tier solution architecture in AWS manner.This solution well solves problems such as disaster recovery, failover, load balancing, and network domain separation. Below is the detailed description of tools using in the solution. Route 53: Amazon Route 53 is a highly available and scalable Domain Name System (DNS) web service. It has health check abilitiy and failover solution. By using Route 53, you can fine-tune the DNS route with continuously high avaliablilty.
